400: The server could not understand your request. Please ensure you have provided valid data or parameters
403: You don't have permission to access the requested resource.
404: The requested resource could not be found. Please verify the URL or check if the resource still exists.
405: The requested HTTP method is not supported for this resource. Please use a different method or check the API documentation;
408: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server. Please check your network connection and try again.
413: The request payload exceeds the size limit. Please reduce the payload size and try again.
429: You have exceeded the rate limit for this operation. Please wait and try again later.
500: An unexpected error occurred on our server. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
502: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server. Please try again later or report the issue to our support team.
OurEnd: This is likely an issue on our end.
401General: Access to the requested resource is unauthorized. Please make sure you are logged in or provide valid credentials.
401Auth: You have entered an invalid email or password. If you have an account, please verify the credentials you have provided.
SupportPersists: If this issue persists, contact support.
SupportMistake: If you believe this is a mistake, contact support.
